title: Set default search engine for Keep and other apps
content: Noticed when I highlight text in Keep, the 'search' has become 'search Bing'. I have Outlook installed, which requires device admin privileges, but I've never been asked or given explicit permission for it to change my default search engine to Bing, now I can't find a way to switch it back to Google.
category: Setting up and Personalizing your Device, Google Pixel 3
